title: FS; Raw T206 Joss port/Lumley port
author: 3-2-count

posts.post_title: FS; Raw T206 Joss port/Lumley port
posts.post_content:
*****SOLD*****


For sale as one lot - T206 Joss & Lumley portraits.

Lumley has some sort of red paint in a few spots as well as a chip on the left border. Also has a teeny circular paper pull on the reverse, right side. Displays an angle cut.

Joss has a few light surface wrinkles on the front left corner and what looks to be a tiny pin hole at the very edge of the top border. Hard to see with the naked eye, but its there. 

Addie was graded a Psa 1, but I cracked it and placed it into a top loader since it presented far better raw than it did in that silly slab. Just a pretty card!

$220 bucks (delivered) takes the pair. Payment by PayPal FF preferred.

First one to post here that they'll take em, gets em both. Thanks all, Tony

[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/threetwocount/threetwocount/lumleyjossfronts.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/threetwocount/threetwocount/lumleyjossbacks.jpg[/IMG]
I will take them please. Thanks

Sold in 4 mins. A new world record. They are yours!
